name: Chain Devil
description: A humanoid figure draped in living, barbed chains that writhe and lash as if alive, sometimes obscured by an iron mask or a twisted expression of agony.
memorable: Commands animated chains and inflicts psychic fear through its unnerving mask ability.
goals: To enforce the will of higher devils, bind, torture, and instill fear in its victims.
relations: Often serves as a jailer or enforcer to higher-ranking devils.
environment: Typically found in the Nine Hells or places of torment and punishment.
strengths: Highly resilient to fire and poison damage, with advantages against magical effects, and capable of grappling enemies with chains.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage; struggles against ranged or magical attackers that can evade close combat.
attacks: Multiattack with chains to grapple and restrain targets, dealing slashing and ongoing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Unnerving Mask creates an illusion that frightens foes, exploiting psychological tactics during combat.
senses: Possesses Devil's Sight, allowing it to see through magical darkness.
skills: Skilled in survival, making it a competent tracker of enemies.
additional_information: Chains can be animated to attack independently.
Rattling chains can be heard from great distances when moving.
Can track grappling targets for up to 30 days.
Immune to poisoned condition and has multiple resistances.
Possesses significant Charisma, allowing it to instill fear.
